## hpr3777 :: Running Haiku on Bhyve, the BSD Hypervisor

 
Bhyve - The BSD Hypervisor
https://bhyve.org/
vm-bhyve - Management system for FreeBSD bhyve virtual
machines
https://github.com/churchers/vm-bhyve
Haiku - Open-source OS inspired by BeOS
https://www.haiku-os.org/
UEFI Booting Haiku
https://www.haiku-os.org/guides/uefi_booting/
